name: Compute Best K-means Evaluations
description: Basic script to use the best-kmeans library

inputs.name: cluster-args
inputs.description: Map of args for clustering (excluding dataset and k) for k search

inputs.name: k-min
inputs.description: Minimum value of k for search

inputs.name: k-max
inputs.description: Maximum value of k for search

inputs.name: num-seeds
inputs.description: Number of seeds to test for each possible 'k'

inputs.name: clean
inputs.description: Delete intermediate objects created during computation
